Text:
Been waiting for this for 2 years now, but didn't like it :(

Not one single song... Maybe Sea of Fate
Thanks for this, finished in like 3 minutes. Album was a bit of a letdown, but still good.

Well I'm digging it so far. Mind you, I've enjoyed the two previous albums and many long-time Rhapsody fans have not.

Thanks uploader.

Well it gets better with each listen :P
That's how I started to like Rhapsody (of Fire) to begin with
too bad the 2 extra tracks aren't worth much, but the book-case (instead of a generic jewel-case) you get looks ok

Thx a lot. For me one of ROF's best albums at all!!!
EPIC!!!
